import React,{useState} from "react"; import Portal from "../Portal"; const Navbar=()=>{ const [coords, setCoords] = useState({}); // takes current button coordinates const [isOn, setOn] = useState(false); const turnOn=(e)=>{ const rect=e.target.getBoundingClientRect() setOn(true) setCoords({ left: rect.x + rect.width / 3, right:rect.x + rect.width / 3*2, }); } const signInPage=isOn?
:"" return(
miTinerary
Home My Trips
Github {turnOn(e)}} className="button is-link">Sign In
{signInPage}
) } export default Navbar
